book.synopsis: The discovery of errant living notes escaped from an extradimensional symphony leads Spellsinger Jon-Tom and his otter sidekick, Mudge, on a perilous quest to rescue some spoiled princesses, battle a guerrilla gorilla, and match wits with an evil alien band
book.dimensions: Height: 7 Inches, Length: 4.25 Inches, Weight: 0.35 Pounds, Width: 0.875 Inches
